title: @Riot So Jinx is getting her first Legendary skin after only 3 years of release
body:
I'm a little offended Riot.
It took Ashe 7 years to get her first legendary skin, and she doesn't even have a single 1350 skin whereas Jinx already has two.
And sure, I get pleasing the fans since Jinx is like, one of the favorite champions in the whole game, but still.

Where is the loyalty?
Zyra has been out for longer than Jinx even yet she is sitting around with three skins only, 1 of which is a team skin, meaning the love didn't even come from Riot but SKT T1.

I think, for just a bit, Riot should stop giving us what we want and start giving us a little bit more of what we need.
Yorick is probably gonna get a new skin now thanks to his big ol' rework, but there are still however many champions that haven't been touched in forever; not to mention even that however many peeps would like for Riot to go back and touch up some of the old Legendary skins like Gentleman Cho'Gath, Cooperate Mundo, or make Pulsefire Ezreal on par with the rest of the Ultimate skins.

To finish this off, don't misunderstand this post, I absolutely love the new Star Guardian skins. Each of them look amazing and chances are I'll end up owning at least one, if not all of them.
But as a decently aged League player, it would be great seeing some of the corner champions be dusted off and dressed nice too.
